subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: For a kid who grew up watching the Mets at Shea Stadium and playing ball at Queens fields like Little Bay Park, Mike Baxter’s Mets debut Monday night was as exciting as he could have imagined.
snippet: For a kid who grew up watching the Mets at Shea Stadium and playing ball at Queens fields like Little Bay Park, Mike Baxter’s Mets debut Monday night was as exciting as he could have imagined.
